taskbody.prereq:
To perform this procedure, you need:
A workstation with internet access.
Permission to download files from the File Portal - Download Zenoss Enterprise Software site. customers may request permission by filing a ticket at .
A secure network copy program.
taskbody.context:
Use this procedure to
download the required files to a workstation
copy the files to the hosts that need them
Perform these steps:

step.cmd: In a web browser, navigate to the File Portal - Download Zenoss Enterprise Software site.
Log in with the account provided by .
Download the self-installing Docker image files.
step.stepxmp:
Select the files with the highest version number. The version number is represented as Version in the following file names:
install-zenoss-isvcs-zookeeper:vVersion.run
install-zenoss-serviced-isvcs:vVersion.run

step.cmd: Download a RHEL/CentOS repository mirror file.
step.info: The download site provides a repository mirror file each supported release of RHEL/CentOS. Each file contains the package and its dependencies.
step.stepxmp:
To download the correct repository mirror file, match the operating system release number in the file name (centos7.1 or centos7.2) with the version of RHEL/CentOS installed on all of the hosts in your cluster. Also, choose the file with the highest version number. The version number represented as Version in the following file names:
yum-mirror-centos7.centos7.1-Version.x86_64.rpm
yum-mirror-centos7.centos7.2-Version.x86_64.rpm

step.cmd: Use a secure copy program to copy the files to cluster hosts.

ul.li: Copy all of the files to the master host.
Copy the repository mirror (RPM) file to all delegate hosts.
